title: Create LTFH estimations for a configuration. — LTFH

title: Create LTFH estimations for a configuration. — LTFH
text: covmat covariance matrix phenos binary vector containing phenotype family member form  c(p_subject, p_parent1, p_parent2, p_sibling1, ... ,p_siblingN)  p_familymember binary value (1 2) N Amount rows matrix estimations saved K prevalance trait s_val starting value estimates min_run minimum amount runs burn all_est TRUE return value iteration burn

title: Create LTFH estimations for a configuration. — LTFH
